item.title: sort Xcode project
item.description: I found this perl script can sort Xcode Project sort-Xcode-project-file just download it and run it $ curl -O https://raw.github.com/WebKit/webkit/master/Tools/Scripts/sort-Xcode-project-file $ chmod +x sort-Xcode-project-file $ ./sort-Xcode-project-file MyProject.xcodeproj/project.pbxproj you need to change MyProject to you xcode project name
